title: Franklin D. Roosevelt: A President at War

questions.text: Franklin D. Roosevelt is the only president to serve more than two full terms.

Abraham Lincoln is a name that is forever embedded into the collective conscience of every American.

Kevorkian was a firm believer in euthanasia for the terminally ill.
